content: Yeah, the party of doom. . . . jackasses subscribing to Obama's sucker crap about the overwhelming crisis that demanded all sorts of stupid spending excesses. Can't be lettin' a good crisis go to waste, now, can we? Jes lahk Frankie Roosevelt, but less credibility. Jackasses that brayed about defense of the nation by forward action in Iraq and Afghanistan, costing $600+ billion for 6 years, since it was "fiscally irresponsible" and "unaffordable;" but then the jackasses dreamed up and their dupes sucked the swill about trillions more being AOK to foist onto the nation's debt for many decades ahead. Brilliant financial acumen, baby. Talk about a credibility gap.

content: It was the party of "yes we can" that put language in the bailout bill that allowed AIG to pay bonuses to executives. How did that work out for you? The country is just one Chinese call for payment away from insolvency.
